comment:
Extracted Variables:
- \( v \): number of servings of vegetables
- \( f \): number of servings of fruits

Definitions:
- \( v \) (servings of vegetables): integer representing the number of servings of vegetables consumed
- \( f \) (servings of fruits): integer representing the number of servings of fruits consumed

Objective:
- Minimize the cost of the servings of vegetables and fruits consumed

Constraints:
1. \( 2v + 4f \geq 20 \): Total units of vitamins consumed from vegetables and fruits should be at least 20
2. \( 3v + f \geq 30 \): Total units of minerals consumed from vegetables and fruits should be at least 30
